title: inDomain
description:
The ultimate domain search engine, combining price comparison, AI name generation, SEO insights, and domain management in one platform. 
Features real-time domain availability checking across popular and rare extensions. Our AI generates memorable names with multilingual meaning analysis.
Get price alerts for renewals and deals, with instant screenshots. Access SEO metrics to evaluate domain, all while protecting your search privacy.
The built-in domain manager consolidates your portfolio.
